scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Collection 10739 contains Albemarle County land grants. Included are a royal grant, 1769 July, to John Moore signed by Lord Botetourt, and two Commonwealth grants to West Langford, 1798 May 1, signed by James Wood, and 1812 September 19, signed by James Barbour.

The collection 10739-a consists of an 1814 survey by William Woods of Alexander Garrett's plat in Albemarle County, Va.; an 1842 survey by Peter M. McGhee showing Thomas Boyd's plat in Albemarle County; an undated survey by McGhee and an undated plat by John White showing John Moore's Albemarle County land; and a memorandum re: an unidentified survey.
